section.name: JDO2 API
section.p: The Java Data Objects 2.0 (JDO) API is a standard interface-based Java model abstraction of persistence, developed as Java Specification Request 243 under the auspices of the Java Community Process.
This project implements the public interfaces, helper classes and exceptions as specified in the JDO 2.0 specification. They are intended to be shared by all JDO implementations.
